mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cosme(cosmeno, brand, cosmename, rdate, masterno, cosme_cateno, cosme_file, cosme_file_saved, cosme_file_preview, cosme_file_size, cosme_youtube) VALUES(cosme_seq.nextval, #{brand}, #{cosmename}, sysdate, #{masterno}, #{cosme_cateno}, #{cosme_file}, #{cosme_file_saved}, #{cosme_file_preview}, #{cosme_file_size}, #{cosme_youtube})
mapper.select: SELECT cosmeno, brand, cosmename, rdate, masterno, cosme_cateno, cosme_file, cosme_file_saved, cosme_file_preview, cosme_file_size, cosme_youtube FROM cosme ORDER BY cosmeno DESC
SELECT cosmeno, brand, cosmename, rdate, masterno, cosme_cateno, cosme_file, cosme_file_saved, cosme_file_preview, cosme_file_size, cosme_youtube FROM cosme WHERE cosme_cateno=#{cosme_cateno}
SELECT cosmeno, brand, cosmename, rdate, masterno, cosme_cateno, cosme_file, cosme_file_saved, cosme_file_preview, cosme_file_size, cosme_youtube FROM cosme WHERE cosmeno = #{cosmeno}
SELECT cosme_cateno, cosme_catename FROM cosme_cate ORDER BY cosme_cateno ASC
